api.title: RadioGroup.LayoutParams
api.api-signature: public static class RadioGroup.LayoutParams extends LinearLayout.LayoutParams

constant.name: FILL_PARENT
constant.description: Special value for the height or width requested by a View.

constant.name: MATCH_PARENT
constant.description: Special value for the height or width requested by a View.

constant.name: WRAP_CONTENT
constant.description: Special value for the height or width requested by a View.

field.name: gravity
field.description: Gravity for the view associated with these LayoutParams.

field.name: weight
field.description: Indicates how much of the extra space in the LinearLayout will be allocated to the view associated with these LayoutParams.

field.name: bottomMargin
field.description: The bottom margin in pixels of the child.

field.name: leftMargin
field.description: The left margin in pixels of the child.

field.name: rightMargin
field.description: The right margin in pixels of the child.

field.name: topMargin
field.description: The top margin in pixels of the child.

field.name: height
field.description: Information about how tall the view wants to be.

field.name: width
field.description: Information about how wide the view wants to be.

method.name: debug(String output)
method.description: Returns a String representation of this set of layout parameters.

method.name: getLayoutDirection()
method.description: Retuns the layout direction.

method.name: getMarginEnd()
method.description: Returns the end margin in pixels.

method.name: getMarginStart()
method.description: Returns the start margin in pixels.

method.name: isMarginRelative()
method.description: Check if margins are relative.

method.name: resolveLayoutDirection(int layoutDirection)
method.description: This will be called by View.requestLayout().

method.name: setLayoutDirection(int layoutDirection)
method.description: Set the layout direction

method.name: setMarginEnd(int end)
method.description: Sets the relative end margin.

method.name: setMarginStart(int start)
method.description: Sets the relative start margin.

method.name: setMargins(int left, int top, int right, int bottom)
method.description: Sets the margins, in pixels.

method.name: resolveLayoutDirection(int layoutDirection)
method.description: Resolve layout parameters depending on the layout direction.

method.name: setBaseAttributes(TypedArray a, int widthAttr, int heightAttr)
method.description: Extracts the layout parameters from the supplied attributes.

method.name: clone()
method.description: Creates and returns a copy of this object.

method.name: equals(Object obj)
method.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one.

method.name: finalize()
method.description: Called by the garbage collector on an object when garbage collection determines that there are no more references to the object.

method.name: getClass()
method.description: Returns the runtime class of this Object.

method.name: hashCode()
method.description: Returns a hash code value for the object.

method.name: notify()
method.description: Wakes up a single thread that is waiting on this object's monitor.

method.name: notifyAll()
method.description: Wakes up all threads that are waiting on this object's monitor.

method.name: toString()
method.description: Returns a string representation of the object.

method.name: wait(long millis, int nanos)
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object, or some other thread interrupts the current thread, or a certain amount of real time has elapsed.

method.name: wait(long millis)
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until either another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object, or a specified amount of time has elapsed.

method.name: wait()
method.description: Causes the current thread to wait until another thread invokes the notify() method or the notifyAll() method for this object.

method.name: RadioGroup.LayoutParams(int w, int h, float initWeight)

api.name: RadioGroup.LayoutParams
setBaseAttributes
api.api_signature: protected void setBaseAttributes (TypedArray a, int widthAttr, int heightAttr)

parameter.name: widthAttr
parameter.description: int: the width attribute to fetch

parameter.name: heightAttr
parameter.description: int: the height attribute to fetch
